channel.title: [help] fixing noted items [help]
channel.description: well, on my server, when i either spawn an item or withdraw one from my bank, and it's noted, it does not stack. the item is noted like it's suppose to be, but the noted item does not stack on the next one. and also, when i click withdraw as a noted, it doesn't. just withdraws as a normal item. any advice on how to fix?

item.title: [help] fixing noted items [help]
item.dc:creator: @ILOVEJAVA ILOVEJAVA
item.description:
@ILOVEJAVA wrote:

[quote=“I Vain I”][quote author=i0wn3v3ry link=topic=430069.msg3157893#msg3157893 date=1269203478]
go into your client files, class.java, and go to the item your spawning, and put for the item, should say somethinglike stackable:/true
[/quote]
Don’t post unless you know what you’re talking about.
You’re posting unhelpful information.

There’s no “class.java” and stackable items are determined by the server code.
Usually in item.java (317)

Just search “stackable” and add the item id’s.

If this is not a 317, post your server version, and I’ll post the correct way.[/quote]
ty very very very very much. my server version is either 508 or 577, i’m not sure…sorry! but i think it’s 508.

Read full topic

item.title: [help] fixing noted items [help]
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

go into your client files, class.java, and go to the item your spawning, and put for the item, should say somethinglike stackable:/true
